archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.1.5e: e) support the timely application of security updates (e.g. updates to access control lists (ACLs), signatures and firewall rules) to respond to changing threats and vulnerabilities, and attacks when they occur
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
